item.title: Designing GraphQL schemas
item.description: This post made it to top 10 on HackerNews front page. Do engage in discussion there and show us love by giving us a GitHub star.

item.title: Introducing Ristretto: A High-Performance Go Cache
item.description: This post made it to the top of Golang subreddit and is trending in top 10 on the front page of Hacker News.

item.title: The State of Caching in Go
item.description: Since writing this post, we have built Ristretto: A High Performance Go cache. Read all about it here. This post made it to the top of Golang subreddit and is trending #2 on the front page of Hacker News.

item.title: Why Google Needed a Graph Serving System
item.description: This post made it to #3 on HackerNews front page. Do engage in discussion there and show us love by giving us a GitHub star.

item.title: Introducing Badger: A fast key-value store written purely in Go
item.description: We have built an efficient and persistent log structured merge (LSM) tree based key-value store, purely in Go language. It is based upon WiscKey paper included in USENIX FAST 2016.
